testcase.name: Open SwagLabs App to login App
testcase.system-out: When I should see 'Login/android.widget.EditText - Username'................passed When I type 'standard_user' on 'Login/android.widget.EditText - Username'...passed Then I wait for 1 seconds...................................................passed And I should see 'Login/android.widget.EditText - Password'.................passed And I type 'secret_sauce' on 'Login/android.widget.EditText - Password'.....passed Then I wait for 1 seconds...................................................passed And I should see 'Login/android.view.ViewGroup - LoginBtn'..................passed And I click 'Login/android.view.ViewGroup - LoginBtn'.......................passed Then I wait for 2 seconds...................................................passed

testcase.name: Open Product using basic xpath
testcase.system-out: And I should see 'Items/android.widget.TextView - Product'..................passed And I click 'Items/android.widget.TextView - Product'.......................passed Then I wait for 1 seconds...................................................passed

testcase.name: Logout App
testcase.system-out: And I should see 'Items/android.view.ViewGroup - BurgerBtn'.................passed And I click 'Items/android.view.ViewGroup - BurgerBtn'......................passed Then I wait for 1 seconds...................................................passed And I should see 'Logout/android.view.ViewGroup - LogoutBtn'................passed And I click 'Logout/android.view.ViewGroup - LogoutBtn'.....................passed Then I wait for 1 seconds...................................................passed
